rukus.text: 77|1|a l laoh sbath nung khyal( ryy mea la ai kat) del trauv ke  banhchoun mk chea b nd banteab .
77|2|ning khyalpyouh da khlangokla .
77|3|ning mea la ai kat del pongreay popk  ning tukaphlieng .
77|4|ning mea la ai kat del bengchek nouv brakear pit  ning brakear  min pit .
77|5|ning mea la ai kat del noam sar mk aoy banda anakneasar .
77|6|daembi bdeseth real kar daohsa  ryy chea kardasatuen promean .
77|7|pitabrakd nasa  avei delke sanyea nung puok anak nung kaetlaeng  yeang pitabrakd .
77|8|banteabmk nowpel del hvaung phkay trauv ban ke thveu aoy bat ponlu .
77|9|haey nowpel del mekh trauv ke thveu aoy bek thlouhthleay .
77|10|haey nowpel del phnom trauv ke thveu aoy phtoh baeng khe  t ch khtei .
77|11|haey nowpel del banda anakneasar trauv ke bramoul tam  kalkamnt .
77|12|tae banda anakneasar trauv ban ke ponyearpel bramoul rhaut  dl thngainea
77|13|ku rhautadl thngai katsechakdei .
77|14|tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  thngai vinichchhy chea avei noh
77|15|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|16|tae yeung minban bamphlanh puok chomnean moun( del ban br pru td  babakamm) te ryy
77|17|banteabmk  yeung thveu aoy puok chomnean kraoy vineasa b nd banteab  pi puokke tiet  .
77|18|dau che  neah der  yeung thveu towleu puok br pru td babakamm .
77|19|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|20|tae yeung minban bangkeut puok anak ampi tukkeam del kmean tamlei  te ryy
77|21|kraoyomk yeung ban bangkeut vea nowknong kanleng muoy del mean  sovotthephap( nowknong sbaun)
77|22|rhautadl pel del trauv ke kamnt da cheakleak .
77|23|haey yeung ban kamnt(roubreang  ning lokkhan robsa mnoussa  lok tam del yeung mean chetnea) .  dau che  neah  yeung kuchea anak del  kamnt da brasaer bamphot .
77|24|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|25|tae yeung minban bangkeut phendei chea kanleng bramoulophdom
77|26|teang anak rsa ning anak slab te ryy
77|27|haey yeung ban bangkeut phnom khpasa  now leu vea ning ban phdal tuk  brisotth aoy puok anak .
77|28|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|29|( mean ke niyeay towkean puokke tha)  chaur puok anakdaer tow  kan avei( nork) del puok anak thleab ban bdeseth nung vea choh .
77|30|chaur puok anak daer towkean mlob( phsaeng nei phleung nork) del leat  santhung chea bei phnek noh choh .
77|31|kmean mlob na trachak  haeyka kmeanoavei ach karpar pi andat  phleung nork ban der .
77|32|pitabrakd nasa  vea cheah phkaphleung laeng khpasa dauchchea vimean .
77|33|vea( phkaphleung) hakbeidauchchea hvaung satv audth sambour lueng .
77|34|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|35|nih kuchea thngai del puokke min ach niyeay ban laey .
77|36|haey puokke min trauv ke anounhnhat aoy niyeaydaohsa ban  laey .
77|37|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
77|38|nih haey kuchea thngai katsechakdei  del yeung ban bramoul  puok anak  ning puok chomnean moun .
77|39|dau che  neah  brasenbae puok anak mean lbichakl  chaur puok anak rieb  lbichakl brachheang nung yeung choh .
77|40|now thngai noh  kar vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del  bdeseth nung karpit .
